data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Balkan, Turkmenistan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Balkan, Turkmenistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 614 believers find a person of peace today among the 551,386 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary: On average, 44 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Balkan, Turkmenistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Balkan. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Balkan, Turkmenistan.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Dargin people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Dargin people.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Balkan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Balkan, Turkmenistan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the state of Balkan, Turkmenistan has a population of 552,000.

We estimate Balkan has 614 people who might know Jesus, 20,588 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 530,798 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 899 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Balkan, Turkmenistan that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
